# SCNParticleBlendMode

**Enumeration**

Options for combining source and destination pixel colors when compositing particles during rendering, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/blendMode] property.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SCNParticleBlendMode
```

## Constants

- **SCNParticleBlendMode.additive**: The source and destination colors are added together.
- **SCNParticleBlendMode.subtract**: The source color is subtracted from the destination color.
- **SCNParticleBlendMode.multiply**: The source color is multiplied by the destination color.
- **SCNParticleBlendMode.screen**: The source color is added to the destination color times the inverted source color.
- **SCNParticleBlendMode.alpha**: The source and destination colors are blended by multiplying the source alpha value.
- **SCNParticleBlendMode.replace**: The source color replaces the destination color.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing Particle Rendering

- **blendMode**: The blending mode for compositing particle images into the rendered scene.
- **orientationMode**: The mode defining whether and how particles may rotate.
- **SCNParticleOrientationMode**: Options for restricting the orientation of particles, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/orientationMode] property.
- **sortingMode**: The mode defining the order in which SceneKit renders the system’s particles.
- **SCNParticleSortingMode**: Options for the rendering order of particles, used by the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNParticleSystem/sortingMode] property.
- **isLightingEnabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether SceneKit applies lighting to particle images when rendering.
- **isBlackPassEnabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether SceneKit renders particles in black before rendering the particle image.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
